channel.title: Home on Guillaume's graphics blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Guillaume's graphics blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, my name is Guillaume and I am a graphics programmer at AMD in the Advanced Rendering Research group. This site is dedicated to my personal projects, hope you find it useful!

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This will (hopefully) be a place for me to share about my personal experiments in the world of real-time graphics and demomaking, stay tuned!
